name: Spy DNA
description:
Spy DNA is a combat simulation RPG that lets you lead a squad of genetically enhanced agents on the trail of organized crime and international intrigue.

Realistic combat environment sets Spy DNA apart from most tactical games. Our team is driven by an uncompromising focus on creating a combat simulation that is highly realistic, believable, yet intuitively usable.

Things like encumbrance or injuries work just like you'd expect them to from your real-world experience.
